name: Stonehenge
description:
Roaming druids from the southern regions of Albion seek to find an understanding with nature by performing meditative dances upon the fertile soils of Gaia. Stone, water, and life create harmony among nature, and so the nomadic tribe of Fauna have settled, for a time, here; to create a monument that embodies rock. Their dance, the embodiment of fluid, will hopefully establish a connection to the elementals, and in return they will breathe new life into the tribe.

This, is Stonehenge.

Stonehenge is a cooperative local multi game for 2 or 4 players. Each player controls limbs of a druid who is trying to fit through different shaped blocks. Do the splits or wave "hi" to your mom! Just be aware of the speeding mystical rock foundations that are out to knock you out... stone cold.

Made by Blake Grotewold: (@groteworld) & Ian Sundstrom (@iansundstrom) in 48 hours as part of Global Game Jam 2016.
